title: Enchanted {Aromatherapy & Crystal Candle}

cleaned_text: $ 16.00 $ 0.00 This gorgeous candle is one of a kind! Made with PURE essential oils, mica, herbs and a healing amethyst crystal. It is a clean burning candle made with a blend of soy and coconut wax. The calming scents of Clary Sage, Lavender and Grapefruit will give you a feeling of inner peace. Ingredients: Soy & Coconut wax blend, Lavender Essential Oil, Grapefruit Essential Oil, Spearmint Essential Oil, Clary Sage Flowers, Mica & Amethyst Crystal This candle comes in a 4 fluid ounce glass jar.
